details.title: QuantumLeap source
details.description: Retrieve QuantumLeap history and updates in real time using Context Broker.

preference.name: historical_server
preference.label: QuantumLeap server URL
preference.description: URL of the QuantumLeap server to use for retrieving entity information

preference.name: ngsi_server
preference.label: NGSI server URL
preference.description: URL of the Orion Context Broker to use for retrieving entity information

preference.name: ngsi_proxy
preference.label: NGSI proxy URL
preference.description: URL of the Orion Context Broker proxy to use for receiving notifications about changes

preference.name: use_user_fiware_token
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the user logged into WireCloud. Take into account this option cannot be enabled if you want to use this widget in a public workspace as anonoymous users doesn't have a valid FIWARE auth token. As an alternative, you can make use of the "Use the FIWARE credentials of the workspace owner" preference.

preference.name: use_owner_credentials
preference.label: Use the FIWARE credentials of the workspace owner
preference.description: Use the FIWARE credentials of the owner of the workspace. This preference takes preference over "Use the FIWARE credentials of the user".

preference.name: ngsi_tenant
preference.label: FIWARE-Service
preference.description: Tenant/service to use when connecting to the context broker. Must be a string of alphanumeric characters (lowercase) and the "_" symbol. Maximum length is 50 characters. If empty, the default tenant will be used.

preference.name: ngsi_service_path
preference.label: FIWARE-ServicePath
preference.description: Scope/path to use when connecting to the context broker. Must be a string of alphanumeric characters (lowercase) and the "_" symbol separated by "/" slashes. Maximum length is 50 characters. If empty, the default service path will be used: /

preference.name: history_attributes
preference.label: Monitored NGSI Attributes
preference.description: A comma separated list of attributes to monitor for updates. Those changes are tracked by creating a subscription inside the context broker. If this list is empty, that subscription won't be created.

preference.name: historical_length
preference.label: Number of hours for historical information (0 or less for all)
preference.description: Number of hours for historical information. (0 or less for all)

preference.name: from
preference.label: From Date
preference.description: From Date to request de historical information.

preference.name: to
preference.label: To Date
preference.description: To Date to request de historical information.

preference.name: include_metadata
preference.label: Include metadata information
preference.description: Include metadata information for each requested attribute inside historical information

preference.name: update_real_time
preference.label: real time updates
preference.description: Send updated historical info when update is notified
